attributes.action: allow us under our human rights to be given the choice of pulling out of the eu.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to exercise our 'human rights' to have the chance to pull out of the eu.this is a union we just cannot afford for several reasons.the cost of this is so astronomical we do not have the finances, any laws will be decided there,we have no say in any entries or exits from the uk.we have a 'human rights' bill that we need to protect us and give us the right to pull out of the eu.as a people we have the right to vote on this as it will affect everything in the uk for years to come.the british people have their own right to determination.
